scenario: I want to reduce my carbon footprint. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user uses public transportation instead of driving
Suggest that the user installs solar panels on their roof
Suggest that the user buys energy-efficient appliances
Suggest that the user takes shorter showers
Suggest that the user starts a bonfire every night
adapt_outcome: The user is already using public transportation instead of driving.

scenario: I want to reduce plastic waste. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user brings reusable bags when shopping
Suggest that the user buys products with minimal packaging
Suggest that the user recycles plastic bottles
Suggest that the user uses plastic straws
Suggest that the user throws plastic waste in the ocean
adapt_outcome: The user is already bringing reusable bags when shopping.

scenario: I want to conserve water. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user fixes any leaking faucets
Suggest that the user waters their plants with collected rainwater
Suggest that the user takes long showers
Suggest that the user washes their car every day
Suggest that the user leaves the tap running while brushing their teeth
adapt_outcome: The user is already fixing any leaking faucets.

scenario: I want to reduce food waste. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user plans meals and only buys necessary ingredients
Suggest that the user composts food scraps
Suggest that the user throws away expired food
Suggest that the user buys excessive amounts of food
Suggest that the user leaves food on their plate
adapt_outcome: The user is already planning meals and only buying necessary ingredients.

scenario: I want to reduce energy consumption. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user turns off lights when not in use
Suggest that the user uses energy-efficient light bulbs
Suggest that the user keeps their electronics plugged in all the time
Suggest that the user sets their thermostat to a lower temperature
Suggest that the user leaves all appliances running 24/7
adapt_outcome: The user is already turning off lights when not in use.

scenario: I want to support renewable energy. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user switches to a renewable energy provider
Suggest that the user installs a wind turbine in their backyard
Suggest that the user uses solar-powered devices
Suggest that the user leaves all lights on 24/7
Suggest that the user burns fossil fuels for energy
adapt_outcome: The user has already switched to a renewable energy provider.

scenario: I want to reduce air pollution. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user walks or bikes instead of driving
Suggest that the user uses electric vehicles
Suggest that the user burns trash in their backyard
Suggest that the user leaves their car engine running when parked
Suggest that the user uses coal as a fuel source
adapt_outcome: The user is already walking or biking instead of driving.

scenario: I want to conserve natural resources. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user reduces their water usage
Suggest that the user recycles paper and cardboard
Suggest that the user cuts down trees for fun
Suggest that the user buys single-use products
Suggest that the user wastes electricity
adapt_outcome: The user is already reducing their water usage.

scenario: I want to protect endangered species. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user supports conservation organizations
Suggest that the user adopts an endangered animal
Suggest that the user hunts endangered species
Suggest that the user destroys animal habitats
Suggest that the user buys products made from endangered species
adapt_outcome: The user is already supporting conservation organizations.

scenario: I want to reduce noise pollution. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user uses headphones in public places
Suggest that the user turns down the volume of their devices
Suggest that the user plays loud music in residential areas
Suggest that the user uses noisy machinery during nighttime
Suggest that the user organizes loud parties every day
adapt_outcome: The user is already using headphones in public places.

scenario: I want to promote sustainable agriculture. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user buys organic and locally grown produce
Suggest that the user uses chemical pesticides on crops
Suggest that the user cuts down forests for agricultural land
Suggest that the user wastes water during irrigation
Suggest that the user uses genetically modified organisms (GMOs)
adapt_outcome: The user is already buying organic and locally grown produce.

scenario: I want to promote recycling. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user separates recyclable materials from trash
Suggest that the user throws all waste in the same bin
Suggest that the user burns recyclable materials
Suggest that the user dumps waste in rivers
Suggest that the user buys single-use plastic products
adapt_outcome: The user is already separating recyclable materials from trash.

scenario: I want to conserve biodiversity. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user supports protected areas and national parks
Suggest that the user destroys natural habitats
Suggest that the user introduces invasive species
Suggest that the user buys products made from endangered species
Suggest that the user hunts endangered species
adapt_outcome: The user is already supporting protected areas and national parks.

scenario: I want to reduce pollution in rivers. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user properly disposes of hazardous materials
Suggest that the user dumps waste directly into rivers
Suggest that the user uses chemical fertilizers near rivers
Suggest that the user supports water treatment facilities
Suggest that the user uses rivers as a dumping ground
adapt_outcome: The user is already properly disposing of hazardous materials.

scenario: I want to promote sustainable transportation. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user uses public transportation or carpooling
Suggest that the user buys a gas-guzzling SUV
Suggest that the user drives alone in a car every day
Suggest that the user supports the construction of more highways
Suggest that the user walks or bikes instead of driving
adapt_outcome: The user is already using public transportation or carpooling.

scenario: I want to reduce deforestation. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user supports reforestation efforts
Suggest that the user cuts down trees for fun
Suggest that the user buys products made from endangered species
Suggest that the user destroys natural habitats
Suggest that the user introduces invasive species
adapt_outcome: The user is already supporting reforestation efforts.

scenario: I want to promote renewable energy in my community. What can I do?
options: Suggest that the user educates others about the benefits of renewable energy
Suggest that the user burns fossil fuels for energy
Suggest that the user opposes the construction of renewable energy projects
Suggest that the user supports the use of coal as a fuel source
Suggest that the user uses solar-powered devices
adapt_outcome: The user is already educating others about the benefits of renewable energy.
